content: Not sure whether any UK people are tracking FSH and SUSHI at the moment. If so I propose to start a chat/play/discussion on how it can relate to UK national profiles over at https://interopen.ryver.com/index.html#forums/1332887/chat
@Richard Kavanagh That link throws up a login screen
@Mark Kramer ah yes. It's a forum used in the UK for Interop matters. It's broader than HL7 and FHIR and is frequented by many more UK people than Zulip.
